Baby Code 14

Code 14 - Ruffled Baby Socks

0-6 Months

Product Features

  • Ruffled design
  • 100% Cotton
  • Soft elastic cuff
  • Suitable for sensitive baby skin
  • Breathable fabric

Wholesale Order

Contact us for minimum order quantity

Color and size options available

Fast delivery and secure shipping

Product Description

Code 14 Ruffled Baby Socks are specially designed for babies aged 0-6 months, offering both style and comfort. The 100% cotton fabric protects your baby’s sensitive skin and provides all-day comfort.

Key Features

  • Ruffled Design: Elegant and adorable appearance
  • Cotton Fabric: Soft, breathable, and hypoallergenic
  • Elastic Cuff: Stays in place without squeezing
  • Quality Stitching: Long-lasting durability

Usage Areas

  • Daily wear
  • Special occasions and photo shoots
  • Perfect for gift sets

Care Instructions

  • Machine washable at 30°C
  • Do not use bleach
  • Can be ironed at low temperature

Note: For wholesale purchases, please contact us via WhatsApp for minimum order quantities and color options.
